subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Elliot Johnson, a Rays reserve second baseman, barreled over Francisco Cervelli at home plate in the ninth inning, fracturing the catcher’s right wrist, in a spring training game the Yankees lost 4-1.
snippet: Elliot Johnson, a Rays reserve second baseman, barreled over Francisco Cervelli at home plate in the ninth inning, fracturing the catcher’s right wrist, in a spring training game the Yankees lost 4-1.
